pullRequest.title: FIx unit tests in master
pullRequest.bodyText:
FIx some tests related to Journal Abbreviation and some other minor issues



 Change in CHANGELOG.md described (if applicable)
 Tests created for changes (if applicable)
 Manually tested changed features in running JabRef (always required)
 Screenshots added in PR description (for UI changes)
 Checked documentation: Is the information available and up to date? If not created an issue at https://github.com/JabRef/user-documentation/issues or, even better, submitted a pull request to the documentation repository.

commit.message: Fix test for abbreviatons, remove obsolete test

nodes.bodyText: I think this is a wrong semantics here. The built-in refers to the built-in journal list, but fullToAbbreviation is read from the file passed as the constructor argument.
With this method removed, how are custom journal abbreviation lists (csv files) loaded?

commit.message: Fixed whitespaces and removed some unused methods
